title: COVID Is Their “Great Reset” (Ep 1752)
description:
COVID is their “Great Reset”! In this episode, I address the left’s coordinated abuse of power to “reset” society. 
News Picks:


“Russian disinformation” is the left’s preferred means of censorship.

The Biden administration is desperate to save its mask mandate. 

Democrat operative complains that the Democrat party isn’t feared. 

Are we already living in the movie “Children of Men.” 

An update on potential food shortages coming. 

Beware of “Kafka traps.”
